attributes.action: Remove the Post Qualified Experience (PQE) from job requirements.
attributes.additional_details: It is illegal under the Equality Act to discriminate on age, if it is not relevant. Jobs should be set out to require the type or types of experience needed for a role rather than ask for a certain number of years' experience.
attributes.background: When applying for legal jobs, a more qualified lawyer is often excluded from roles due to their PQE being too senior, which is irrelevant to their ability to perform the role.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for employers and not the UK Government or Parliament.
